rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: This is the main entrance area with a small foyer that leads to various parts of the bungalow. It incorporates natural light and an open space to welcome visitors.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area with Bohemian decor elements such as mixed textiles and art installations. The room has large windows on the east side to capture morning sunlight.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: An open dining area adjacent to the living room with a modern Bohemian style featuring eclectic table designs and artistic chairs.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen designed with an open layout. It includes modern appliances, a central island for cooking and interaction, following Vastu guidelines for energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A cozy bedroom intended for guests. The room has a Bohemian theme with decorative elements and a peaceful ambiance.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A second guest bedroom offering a comfortable sleeping area with an open window for ventilation and fresh air.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The primary bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom. The design includes Bohemian accents such as textured wall finishes and a mix of natural fibers.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: A private bathroom attached to the master bedroom with water elements and natural lighting considerations per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Study/Workroom
rooms.description: A quiet workspace designed with a comfortable desk and ergonomic seating. The room has access to natural light for productivity.

rooms.name: Bohemian Lounge
rooms.description: A versatile lounge area that doubles as a meditation space or additional living area. It features eclectic furniture and artistic decor.

openings.name: Front Entrance Door
openings.description: A wide, inviting door with Bohemian art motifs. It facilitates smooth energy flow and aligns with Vastu for positive energy.

openings.name: Side Windows
openings.description: Large windows to ensure ample natural light in the living areas, maintaining balance as per Vastu principles.

openings.name: Backdoor
openings.description: A secure backdoor connecting to outdoor spaces and the pool area, designed for both privacy and safety.

swimming_pool.description: A modern swimming pool integrated into the landscape design. It offers relaxation while maintaining adherence to Vastu guidelines by keeping water elements in a harmonious location.

verandah.description: A shaded verandah that serves as an extension of the living space, perfect for morning tea and relaxation.

levels.notes: Design follows local building norms with adherence to Vastu principles. The floor plan has been structured to ensure proper energy flow, privacy, and a Bohemian aesthetic throughout.
